General: Take a selfie with another volunteer outside of a session
Share one cool fact you learn about another **eReuse** member
Find someone who has a *niche* hobby that you share
Fun: Create a meme about something that happens in a session this week
Draw the **eReuse** logo and stick it on someones back without them noticing
Perform a cool photo pose with at least 2 other **eReuse** members
Find someone who has a spotify blend with you over 90%
Tech: Solve the **Wordle** on a device you fix during a session
Set the **eReuse** logo as the profile photo when logging into windows
Teach someone something new about refurbishing
